message: I can assure you, everyone who has spent a few years coding professionally knows this advice, and speaks it up to newbies who ask, and to equal-level office mates as well. Except not everyone of them applies the advice to themselves in the first place, except those who are duct-tape/dark-matter programmers maybe...
story: Meligy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Stop reading this blog and learn something | Virtuous Code
caption: devblog.avdi.org
description: Software development is a wonderful field to be a noob in.
